title: FS: Large Lot of Low-Grade T206 w/ HOFs - **PRICE DROP**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Large Lot of Low-Grade T206 w/ HOFs - **PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale or trade. These are all low grade cards as the scans will show, and are priced accordingly. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards from list for easier viewing):

Bell - $20
Blackburne - $20 (tiny paper separation on center right border)
Brain - $18
Ganley - $22 
Jennings - $30
J. White - $12
Marc is awesome. Buy with confidence.  He was the guy who really put me on the road to finishing up my 520 set.

Thanks, Todd!  That's very nice of you to say.  I greatly enjoyed dealing with you as well!  Putting together a low grade T206 set was one of the most fun and rewarding collecting projects I've ever had, so I'm always especially glad to help others along on that journey.

Marc--I'll take Evers if he's still available. 

Thanks, Mike
Bump for a price drop on the remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
